alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 1:14PM MST until February 28 at 10:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Pennington County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
